import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import Header from "./Header" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import * as XLSX from 'xlsx'; import { saveAs } from 'file-saver'; function ContactForm() { const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState("") const [lastName, setLastName] = useState("") const [fullName, setFullName] = useState("") const [email, setEmail] = useState("") const [phone, setPhone] = useState("") const [streetAddress, setStreetAddress] = useState("") const [city, setCity] = useState("") const [state, setState] = useState("") const [zipCode, setZipCode] = useState("") const [plan, setPlan] = useState("") const [comment, setComment] = useState("") const [businessOrResidential, setBusinessOrResidential] = useState("") const navigate = useNavigate() const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() navigate("/confirmation") } return ( <>
First Name setFirstName(e.target.value)} /> Last Name { setLastName(e.target.value); setFullName(firstName + " " + e.target.value) }} /> E-Mail Address setEmail(e.target.value)} /> Phone setPhone(e.target.value)} />
Street Address setStreetAddress(e.target.value)} /> City setCity(e.target.value)} /> State setState(e.target.value)} /> Zip Code setZipCode(e.target.value)} />
How Can We Help?
Business or Residential {/* Plans */} {/* if residential is selected show the residential options, if business is selected show the business options */} {businessOrResidential === "Residential" ? ( <> Select a Plan ) : ( <> Select a Plan )}
) } export default ContactForm
